channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Async-Async revisited: What about cancellation?】重新审视异步-Async：取消呢？
item.description: 【Even the cancellation is async.】即使取消也是异步。

item.title: 【Go 1.23.6-2 and 1.22.12-2 Microsoft builds now available】GO 1.23.6-2和1.22.12-2 Microsoft现在可用
item.description: 【A new release of the Microsoft build of Go including security fixes is now available for download.】现在可以下载Microsoft Go Build的新版本。

item.title: 【First preview of Visual Studio 2022 v17.14】Visual Studio 2022 V17.14的首次预览
item.description: 【We are pleased to announce the release of Visual Studio 2022 v17.14 Preview 1, marking the initial preview of our next update to Visual Studio. This update prioritizes delivering exceptional developer experiences, with an emphasis on stability and security, as well as AI enhancements. Download the preview and see the full list of enhancements in […]】我们很高兴地宣布，Visual Studio 2022 V17.14 Preview 1的发布，标志着我们对Visual Studio的下一个更新的初步预览。此更新优先考虑提供卓越的开发人员体验，重点是稳定性和安全性以及AI增强功能。下载预览，并查看[…]中的完整增强功能列表

item.title: 【Announcing Generative AI for Beginners – .NET】宣布初学者的生成AI - .NET
item.description: 【Introducing a new practical course designed for the .NET community to explore the world of Generative AI.】引入了为.NET社区设计的新实用课程，以探索生成AI的世界。

item.title: 【Unified manifest support for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint is available for preview】统一的对单词，Excel和PowerPoint的清单支持可用于预览
item.description: 【The unified manifest is a key component of the Microsoft 365 ecosystem providing a single model for distributing and managing Teams apps, Outlook add-ins, as well as Copilot agents which work across Microsoft 365 apps. We've released it for Outlook, and now it is available for Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.】统一的清单是Microsoft 365生态系统的关键调节器，可提供用于分发和管理团队应用程序，Outlook附加组件以及跨Microsoft 365应用程序的Copilot代理。 我们已将其发布给Outlook，现在可以适用于Word，PowerPoint和Excel。

item.title: 【External REST Endpoint Invocation in Azure SQL Managed Instance is now in Public Preview】Azure SQL托管实例中的外部休息端点调用现已在公共预览中
item.description: 【External REST Endpoint Invocation is available in Azure SQL Managed Instance with the Always-up-to-date update policy configured. Call Azure Services such as functions, Azure OpenAI, event hubs, content safety and more! To enable this feature in Azure SQL Managed Instance, run the following code: sp_configure 'external rest endpoint enabled', 1; RECONFIGURE WITH OVERRIDE; To execute […]】外部休息端点调用可在Azure SQL托管实例中获得，并配置了始终上升到日期的更新策略。致电Azure Services，例如功能，Azure OpenAI，Event Hubs，内容安全性等等！要在Azure SQL托管实例中启用此功能，请运行以下代码：sp_configure“启用外部休息端点”，1;重新配置覆盖；执行[…]

item.title: 【GitHub Copilot for Eclipse: Code Completion Now in Public Preview】Eclipse的GitHub Copilot：CODE CODENT，现在在Public Preview中
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the Public Preview of GitHub Copilot for Eclipse. As part of the broader GitHub Copilot family, which enhances productivity in various IDEs, this latest integration ensures that developers using Eclipse can benefit from AI-assisted coding like never before. GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered code assistant designed to streamline software development […]】我们很高兴宣布Github Copilot的Eclipse公开预览。作为更广泛的Github Copilot家族的一部分，它提高了各种IDE的生产力，这一最新集成确保了使用Eclipse的开发人员可以从前所未有的AI辅助编码中受益。 GitHub Copilot是AI驱动的代码助理，旨在简化软件开发[…]

item.title: 【DocumentDB is Gaining Momentum in the Open-Source Database World】DocumentDB正在开源数据库世界中获得动力
item.description: 【In the short amount of time since we unveiled DocumentDB, our open-source document database platform powering the vCore based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB, and the feedback has been nothing short of phenomenal. In this short time, we’ve received a lot of attention from tech media and community members alike. Rapid Community Adoption Developers and […]】自从我们揭幕DocumentDB以来，我们的开源文档数据库平台为MongoDB提供了为Vcore的Azure Cosmos DB提供动力的时间，并且反馈简直是惊人的。在短时间内，我们引起了科技媒体和社区成员的广泛关注。快速的社区收养开发商和[…]

item.title: 【Simplify your .NET data transfers with the new Azure Storage Data Movement library】用新的Azure存储数据移动库简化您的.NET数据传输
item.description: 【This post announces the new and improved Azure Storage Data Movement library for .NET.】这篇文章宣布了.NET的新的和改进的Azure存储数据运动库。

item.title: 【PowerShell 7.5 GA is now available】Powershell 7.5 GA现在可用
item.description: 【We’re pleased to announce the release of PowerShell 7.5.0! For this release the focus has been on quality, security and stability of the platform. We greatly appreciate the enormous amount of community contributions in this release along with new cmdlets, experimental features and other quality of life additions. PowerShell 7.5 is built on top of […]】我们很高兴宣布发布PowerShell 7.5.0！对于此版本，重点放在平台的质量，安全性和稳定性上。我们非常感谢新版本中的大量社区贡献以及新的CMDLET，实验特征和其他生活质量。 Powershell 7.5建立在[…]之上
